title: Get involved in our Many Voices One Story campaign
text:
The campaign launched to maintain our commitment to our readers to retain balance and present many different points of view, but stating explicitly that our view is a referendum on the final deal is right.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Our stance on this remains unchanged and now time is of the essence. Many Voices One Story provides a platform for people to openly share their perspectives on Brexit and ensure the unheard, unexpected and the trusted voices of our country, join together and have a final say before the 31 October.

Throughout the month we will be sharing the many voices of Brexit across our social media channels so please follow #ManyVoicesOneStory to get involved and have your say. We would love for you to join us and it’s quite easy to get involved:

Download a blank placard and write why you want a final say on Brexit

Take a photo of you holding the placard

Share it with us on Twitter or Instagram using the hashtag #ManyVoicesOneStory and #FinalSay
